scripts.dev: tb -c FastApi startDev main && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8384 webpack serve --mode development --open
scripts.devD: tb -c FastApi edit-api main_D 0.0.0.0 5000 -c DB edit_cli RR -c FastApi startDev main ${DEV_MODULES} -n debug && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8384 webpack serve --mode development
scripts.live: tb -c FastApi start main && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8384 webpack serve --mode production
scripts.liveD: tb -c FastApi edit-api main 0.0.0.0 5000 -c DB edit_cli RR -c FastApi start main && webpack serve --mode production
